channel.title: Help with compile and run
channel.description:
when ever i try to compile it says
the system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue.....
and when i run(which of course wont work)it says
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file press any key to continue....
so what do i do?
